articles.title: Prince Harry ‘in shock’ after quitting his African AIDS charity - CNN
articles.description: Britain’s Prince Harry said he was “in shock” after quitting as a patron of Sentebale, a British charity he set up to help young people with HIV and AIDS in Lesotho and Botswana, following a row between trustees and the chair of the board.
